example.eg: The queen rode by in a coach, and guards walked alongside.
example.egtrans: 女王坐四轮马车经过，警卫走路同行。

example.eg: Alongside the road was a man selling peanuts.
example.egtrans: 路边有一位卖花生的人。

dsense.name: alongside [sb/sth]
dsense.guideword: figurative (work, etc.: in cooperation with) (工作、合作等)

example.eg: Skylar is lucky to be able to work alongside his father.
example.egtrans: 斯凯拉很幸运能够和他的父亲并肩工作。

example.eg: Katie is going to go alongside Nora.
'Come sit alongside of me,' said Minnie to the new boy.
example.egtrans: “来，坐到我旁边。”米妮对新来的男孩说。
